content:encoded:
This week’s Case Closed begins with The Vanishing Runner, from Mr. District Attorney. That story aired December 28, 1952.

(27:50) Danger With Granger closes out this week’s episode with their broadcast from 1956, titled, The Missing Necklace.

Download CaseClosed782

Visit donate.relicradio.com for more information on how you can support Case Closed. Your help keeps this show coming every week! Thank you.
